mapper.insert: insert into dropship (dropship_id, bvo_id, goods_id, goods_num, store_id,upc) values (null , #{bvoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{upc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update dropship set bvo_id = #{bvoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_num = #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, upc = #{upc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dropship_id = #{dropshipId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select dropship_id, bvo_id, goods_id, goods_num, store_id, upc from dropship
select * from dropship where bvo_id = #{bvoId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
